Outgoing Republican Gov: Scott Walker declined $1 billion in federal funds for Medicaid expansion in 2014.
The Wisconsin Legislative Fiscal Bureau: 1.07 billion on Medicaid from 2014 to 2019 if it had implemented a full Medicaid expansion.
As of now: about $114 million of the potential $1 billion has not yet been "lost" due to the decision, but it is unlikely to be reversed by the end of the fiscal year.
